method.text: Place the prawns, ham, almonds, salad onions, oil, egg yolk, cornflour and seasoning in a food processor or blender and process until well mixed.
Cut the crusts from the bread then spread the prawn mixture evenly over the slices. Then cut each slice of bread into 5 fingers or 4 triangles.
Sprinkle the sesame seeds over the fingers and triangles, pressing down slightly to keep in place.
Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan and shallow fry the toasts, prawn side down, in two batches for 3-4 min or until golden brown and crispy.
Drain well on kitchen towel then serve.
